Reviews.Title: Low cost = decent value, but not for harsh environments.  Not for un-supported span
Reviews.Author: Me "Brian"
Reviews.Content: Good value but make sure to support it well as I made a mistake and the BNC ends were overly strained, causing them to fail. (looked fine but broken wire inside)  I had to repair.

Reviews.Title: got what i ordered
Reviews.Author: Robert Tracy "murph1110"
Reviews.Content: price was great compared to local stores, delivery was fast I would definitely use this vendor again

ProductInfo.Features:
Video power extension cable with power supply kit for CCTV security camera DVR system
2 of 100 feet video/power cables in black
2 of 12V 500mA power supplies with 6ft Long Cord 2.1mm Plug
Every video/Power cable connectors has BNC and includes 2 RCA/BNC adapters
Plug and Play ready; For camera with DC power only
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 2 Pack 100 Feet Camera Video Power Extension Cables with 2 of 12V DC 500mA Power Supplies Kit for CCTV DVR Security System CGK
